name: Batteries Not Included (cydneykimmons, makoikeno)
description:
Batteries Not Included is a local co-op horror adventure game (prototype) where two players try to escape a bunker swarming with mutants.

Players must work together and use their flashlights to fend off the monsters, but don't let your batteries die!

Credits: 
Engineering + Design: Cydney Kimmons 
Art + Design:  Christine Ying
Sound Design: Ethan Cohen, Mako Ikeno 

Game controls: 
Left Thumbstick - Player movement 
Right Thumbstick - Player rotation 
Right Trigger - Toggle Flashlight 
A button - Interact + Revive with Med Kit 
B button - Use Med Kit
Y button - Use Battery Pack

3rd Party Assets + Code: 
InControl
Aura Light
QuickOutline
Particle Dissolve Shader
WWise
Various animations from Mixamo 
Various animations from soundsnap
